title: Over the River, Project for the Arkansas River, Colorado
medium: graphite, pastel, charcoal, wax crayon, drawn topographic contour map, and tape, on two sheets of paper in two parts
dimensions:
sheet (top panel): 37.7 x 164.8 cm (14 13/16 x 64 7/8 in.)
sheet (bottom panel): 106 x 164.8 cm (41 3/4 x 64 7/8 in.)
overall size (for both panels): 147 x 165 cm (57 7/8 x 64 15/16 in.)
creditline: Gift of a Private Collector in honor of Dorothy and Herbert Vogel
